name: Game From Scratch Blackmail Revenge
description:
A very short game about GFS getting revenge against the evil extortionist penguin. 

Watch this video for context:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DxBaOKvTtC8

I made this in a few hours using Gimp, Godot, and FL Studio.  This is actually my first time using godot, which I found through GameFromScratch. Anyway, I hope you enjoy it! :)
